verses.verse: It <S%H6925>pleased<s%> <S%H8232><s%> <S%H1868>Darius<s%> to <S%H6966>set<s%> <S%H5922>over<s%> the <S%H4437>kingdom<s%> an <S%H3969>hundred<s%> and <S%H6243>twenty<s%> <S%H324>princes<s%>, which should <S%H1934>be<s%> over the <S%H3606>whole<s%> <S%H4437>kingdom<s%>;

And <S%H5924>over<s%> <S%H4481>these<s%> <S%H8532>three<s%> <S%H5632>presidents<s%>; of <S%H4481>whom<s%> <S%H1841>Daniel<s%> was <S%H2298>first<s%>: <S%H459>that<s%> the <S%H324>princes<s%> <S%H1934>might<s%> <S%H3052>give<s%> <S%H2941>accounts<s%> unto them, and the <S%H4430>king<s%> should <S%H1934>have<s%> <S%H3809>no<s%> <S%H5142>damage<s%>.

<S%H116>Then<s%> <S%H1836>this<s%> <S%H1841>Daniel<s%> <S%H1934>was<s%> <S%H5330>preferred<s%> <S%H5922>above<s%> the <S%H5632>presidents<s%> and <S%H324>princes<s%>, <S%H3606>because<s%> <S%H6903><s%> an <S%H3493>excellent<s%> <S%H7308>spirit<s%> was in him; and the <S%H4430>king<s%> <S%H6246>thought<s%> to <S%H6966>set<s%> him <S%H5922>over<s%> the <S%H3606>whole<s%> <S%H4437>realm<s%>.

<S%H116>Then<s%> the <S%H5632>presidents<s%> and <S%H324>princes<s%> <S%H1934>sought<s%> <S%H1156><s%> to <S%H7912>find<s%> <S%H5931>occasion<s%> against <S%H1841>Daniel<s%> <S%H6655>concerning<s%> the <S%H4437>kingdom<s%>; <S%H3606>but<s%> they <S%H3202>could<s%> <S%H7912>find<s%> <S%H3809>none<s%> <S%H5931>occasion<s%> <S%H3809>nor<s%> <S%H7844>fault<s%>; <S%H6903>forasmuch<s%> as he was <S%H540>faithful<s%>, <S%H3809>neither<s%> was there <S%H3606>any<s%> <S%H7960>error<s%> or <S%H7844>fault<s%> <S%H7912>found<s%> in <S%H5922>him<s%>.

<S%H116>Then<s%> <S%H560>said<s%> <S%H479>these<s%> <S%H1400>men<s%>, We shall <S%H3809>not<s%> <S%H7912>find<s%> <S%H3606>any<s%> <S%H5931>occasion<s%> <S%H5922>against<s%> <S%H1836>this<s%> <S%H1841>Daniel<s%>, <S%H3861>except<s%> we <S%H7912>find<s%> it against him concerning the <S%H1882>law<s%> of his <S%H426>God<s%>.

<S%H116>Then<s%> <S%H459>these<s%> <S%H5632>presidents<s%> and <S%H324>princes<s%> assembled <S%H7284>together<s%> to the <S%H4430>king<s%>, and <S%H560>said<s%> <S%H3652>thus<s%> unto <S%H5922>him<s%>, <S%H4430>King<s%> <S%H1868>Darius<s%>, <S%H2418>live<s%> for <S%H5957>ever<s%>. assembled: or, came tumultuously

<S%H3606>All<s%> the <S%H5632>presidents<s%> of the <S%H4437>kingdom<s%>, the <S%H5460>governors<s%>, and the <S%H324>princes<s%>, the <S%H1907>counsellors<s%>, and the <S%H6347>captains<s%>, have consulted <S%H3272>together<s%> to <S%H6966>establish<s%> a <S%H4430>royal<s%> <S%H7010>statute<s%>, and to make a <S%H8631>firm<s%> <S%H633>decree<s%>, that whosoever shall <S%H1156>ask<s%> a <S%H1159>petition<s%> <S%H4481>of<s%> <S%H3606>any<s%> <S%H426>God<s%> or <S%H606>man<s%> <S%H5705>for<s%> <S%H8533>thirty<s%> <S%H3118>days<s%>, <S%H3861>save<s%> of <S%H4481>thee<s%>, O <S%H4430>king<s%>, he shall be <S%H7412>cast<s%> into the <S%H1358>den<s%> of <S%H744>lions<s%>. decree: or, interdict

<S%H3705>Now<s%>, O <S%H4430>king<s%>, <S%H6966>establish<s%> the <S%H633>decree<s%>, and <S%H7560>sign<s%> the <S%H3792>writing<s%>, that it be <S%H3809>not<s%> <S%H8133>changed<s%>, according to the <S%H1882>law<s%> of the <S%H4076>Medes<s%> and <S%H6540>Persians<s%>, which <S%H5709>altereth<s%> <S%H3809>not<s%>. altereth not: Cald. passeth not
<S%H3606>Wherefore<s%> <S%H1836><s%> <S%H6903><s%> <S%H4430>king<s%> <S%H1868>Darius<s%> <S%H7560>signed<s%> the <S%H3792>writing<s%> and the <S%H633>decree<s%>.

Now when <S%H1841>Daniel<s%> <S%H3046>knew<s%> that the <S%H3792>writing<s%> was <S%H7560>signed<s%>, he <S%H5954>went<s%> into his <S%H1005>house<s%>; and his <S%H3551>windows<s%> being <S%H6606>open<s%> in his <S%H5952>chamber<s%> <S%H5049>toward<s%> <S%H3390>Jerusalem<s%>, he <S%H1289>kneeled<s%> <S%H5922>upon<s%> his <S%H1291>knees<s%> <S%H8532>three<s%> <S%H2166>times<s%> a <S%H3118>day<s%>, and <S%H6739>prayed<s%>, and gave <S%H3029>thanks<s%> <S%H6925>before<s%> his <S%H426>God<s%>, <S%H6903>as<s%> <S%H3606><s%> he <S%H1934>did<s%> <S%H5648><s%> <S%H4481>aforetime<s%> <S%H1836><s%> <S%H6928><s%>.

<S%H116>Then<s%> <S%H479>these<s%> <S%H1400>men<s%> <S%H7284>assembled<s%>, and <S%H7912>found<s%> <S%H1841>Daniel<s%> <S%H1156>praying<s%> and making <S%H2604>supplication<s%> <S%H6925>before<s%> his <S%H426>God<s%>.

<S%H116>Then<s%> they came <S%H7127>near<s%>, and <S%H560>spake<s%> <S%H6925>before<s%> the <S%H4430>king<s%> <S%H5922>concerning<s%> the <S%H4430>king's<s%> <S%H633>decree<s%>; Hast thou <S%H3809>not<s%> <S%H7560>signed<s%> a <S%H633>decree<s%>, that <S%H3606>every<s%> <S%H606>man<s%> that shall <S%H1156>ask<s%> a petition <S%H4481>of<s%> <S%H3606>any<s%> <S%H426>God<s%> or <S%H606>man<s%> <S%H5705>within<s%> <S%H8533>thirty<s%> <S%H3118>days<s%>, <S%H3861>save<s%> of <S%H4481>thee<s%>, O <S%H4430>king<s%>, shall be <S%H7412>cast<s%> into the <S%H1358>den<s%> of <S%H744>lions<s%>? The <S%H4430>king<s%> <S%H6032>answered<s%> and <S%H560>said<s%>, The <S%H4406>thing<s%> is <S%H3330>true<s%>, according to the <S%H1882>law<s%> of the <S%H4076>Medes<s%> and <S%H6540>Persians<s%>, which <S%H5709>altereth<s%> <S%H3809>not<s%>.

<S%H116>Then<s%> <S%H6032>answered<s%> they and <S%H560>said<s%> <S%H6925>before<s%> the <S%H4430>king<s%>, That <S%H1841>Daniel<s%>, which is <S%H4481>of<s%> the <S%H1123>children<s%> of the <S%H1547>captivity<s%> of <S%H3061>Judah<s%>, <S%H7761>regardeth<s%> <S%H2942><s%> <S%H3809>not<s%> <S%H5922>thee<s%>, O <S%H4430>king<s%>, nor the <S%H633>decree<s%> that thou hast <S%H7560>signed<s%>, but <S%H1156>maketh<s%> his <S%H1159>petition<s%> <S%H8532>three<s%> <S%H2166>times<s%> a <S%H3118>day<s%>.

<S%H116>Then<s%> the <S%H4430>king<s%>, when he <S%H8086>heard<s%> these <S%H4406>words<s%>, was <S%H7690>sore<s%> <S%H888>displeased<s%> with himself, and <S%H7761>set<s%> his <S%H1079>heart<s%> <S%H5922>on<s%> <S%H1841>Daniel<s%> to <S%H7804>deliver<s%> him: and he <S%H1934>laboured<s%> <S%H7712><s%> <S%H5705>till<s%> the going <S%H4606>down<s%> of the <S%H8122>sun<s%> to <S%H5338>deliver<s%> him.

<S%H116>Then<s%> <S%H479>these<s%> <S%H1400>men<s%> <S%H7284>assembled<s%> <S%H5922>unto<s%> the <S%H4430>king<s%>, and <S%H560>said<s%> unto the <S%H4430>king<s%>, <S%H3046>Know<s%>, O <S%H4430>king<s%>, that the <S%H1882>law<s%> of the <S%H4076>Medes<s%> and <S%H6540>Persians<s%> is, That <S%H3606>no<s%> <S%H633>decree<s%> nor <S%H7010>statute<s%> which the <S%H4430>king<s%> <S%H6966>establisheth<s%> may be <S%H8133>changed<s%>.

<S%H116>Then<s%> the <S%H4430>king<s%> <S%H560>commanded<s%>, and they <S%H858>brought<s%> <S%H1841>Daniel<s%>, and <S%H7412>cast<s%> him into the <S%H1358>den<s%> of <S%H744>lions<s%>. Now the <S%H4430>king<s%> <S%H6032>spake<s%> and <S%H560>said<s%> unto <S%H1841>Daniel<s%>, Thy <S%H426>God<s%> whom <S%H607>thou<s%> <S%H6399>servest<s%> <S%H8411>continually<s%>, he will <S%H7804>deliver<s%> thee.

And <S%H2298>a<s%> <S%H69>stone<s%> was <S%H858>brought<s%>, and <S%H7761>laid<s%> <S%H5922>upon<s%> the <S%H6433>mouth<s%> of the <S%H1358>den<s%>; and the <S%H4430>king<s%> <S%H2857>sealed<s%> it with his own <S%H5824>signet<s%>, and with the <S%H5824>signet<s%> of his <S%H7261>lords<s%>; that the <S%H6640>purpose<s%> might <S%H3809>not<s%> be <S%H8133>changed<s%> concerning <S%H1841>Daniel<s%>.

<S%H116>Then<s%> the <S%H4430>king<s%> <S%H236>went<s%> to his <S%H1965>palace<s%>, and passed the <S%H956>night<s%> <S%H2908>fasting<s%>: <S%H3809>neither<s%> were <S%H1761>instruments<s%> of musick <S%H5954>brought<s%> <S%H6925>before<s%> him: and his <S%H8139>sleep<s%> <S%H5075>went<s%> from <S%H5922>him<s%>. instruments: or, table

<S%H116>Then<s%> the <S%H4430>king<s%> <S%H6966>arose<s%> very <S%H8238>early<s%> in the <S%H5053>morning<s%>, and <S%H236>went<s%> in <S%H927>haste<s%> unto the <S%H1358>den<s%> of <S%H744>lions<s%>.

And when he <S%H7127>came<s%> to the <S%H1358>den<s%>, he <S%H2200>cried<s%> with a <S%H6088>lamentable<s%> <S%H7032>voice<s%> unto <S%H1841>Daniel<s%>: and the <S%H4430>king<s%> <S%H6032>spake<s%> and <S%H560>said<s%> to <S%H1841>Daniel<s%>, O <S%H1841>Daniel<s%>, <S%H5649>servant<s%> of the <S%H2417>living<s%> <S%H426>God<s%>, is thy <S%H426>God<s%>, whom thou <S%H6399>servest<s%> <S%H8411>continually<s%>, <S%H3202>able<s%> to <S%H7804>deliver<s%> thee <S%H4481>from<s%> the <S%H744>lions<s%>?
<S%H116>Then<s%> <S%H4449>said<s%> <S%H1841>Daniel<s%> <S%H5974>unto<s%> the <S%H4430>king<s%>, O <S%H4430>king<s%>, <S%H2418>live<s%> for <S%H5957>ever<s%>.

My <S%H426>God<s%> hath <S%H7972>sent<s%> his <S%H4398>angel<s%>, and hath <S%H5463>shut<s%> the <S%H744>lions'<s%> <S%H6433>mouths<s%>, that they have <S%H3809>not<s%> <S%H2255>hurt<s%> me: forasmuch <S%H3606>as<s%> <S%H6903><s%> <S%H6925>before<s%> him <S%H2136>innocency<s%> was <S%H7912>found<s%> in me; and <S%H638>also<s%> <S%H6925>before<s%> thee, O <S%H4430>king<s%>, have I <S%H5648>done<s%> <S%H3809>no<s%> <S%H2248>hurt<s%>.

<S%H116>Then<s%> was the <S%H4430>king<s%> <S%H7690>exceeding<s%> <S%H2868>glad<s%> for <S%H5922>him<s%>, and <S%H560>commanded<s%> that they should <S%H5267>take<s%> <S%H1841>Daniel<s%> <S%H5267>up<s%> out <S%H4481>of<s%> the <S%H1358>den<s%>. So <S%H1841>Daniel<s%> was taken <S%H5267>up<s%> out <S%H4481>of<s%> the <S%H1358>den<s%>, and <S%H3809>no<s%> <S%H3606>manner<s%> of <S%H2257>hurt<s%> was <S%H7912>found<s%> upon him, because he <S%H540>believed<s%> in his <S%H426>God<s%>.

And the <S%H4430>king<s%> <S%H560>commanded<s%>, and they <S%H858>brought<s%> <S%H479>those<s%> <S%H1400>men<s%> which had <S%H399>accused<s%> <S%H7170><s%> <S%H1841>Daniel<s%>, and they <S%H7412>cast<s%> them into the <S%H1358>den<s%> of <S%H744>lions<s%>, <S%H581>them<s%>, their <S%H1123>children<s%>, and their <S%H5389>wives<s%>; and the <S%H744>lions<s%> had the <S%H5705>mastery<s%> <S%H7981><s%> of them, and <S%H1855>brake<s%> <S%H3606>all<s%> their <S%H1635>bones<s%> in <S%H1855>pieces<s%> or <S%H3809>ever<s%> they <S%H4291>came<s%> at the <S%H773>bottom<s%> of the <S%H1358>den<s%>.

<S%H116>Then<s%> <S%H4430>king<s%> <S%H1868>Darius<s%> <S%H3790>wrote<s%> unto <S%H3606>all<s%> <S%H5972>people<s%>, <S%H524>nations<s%>, and <S%H3961>languages<s%>, that <S%H1753>dwell<s%> in <S%H3606>all<s%> the <S%H772>earth<s%>; <S%H8001>Peace<s%> be <S%H7680>multiplied<s%> unto you.

<S%H4481>I<s%> <S%H6925><s%> <S%H7761>make<s%> a <S%H2942>decree<s%>, That in <S%H3606>every<s%> <S%H7985>dominion<s%> of my <S%H4437>kingdom<s%> men <S%H1934>tremble<s%> <S%H2112><s%> and <S%H1763>fear<s%> <S%H4481>before<s%> <S%H6925><s%> the <S%H426>God<s%> of <S%H1841>Daniel<s%>: for he is the <S%H2417>living<s%> <S%H426>God<s%>, and <S%H7011>stedfast<s%> for <S%H5957>ever<s%>, and his <S%H4437>kingdom<s%> that which shall <S%H3809>not<s%> be <S%H2255>destroyed<s%>, and his <S%H7985>dominion<s%> shall be even <S%H5705>unto<s%> the <S%H5491>end<s%>.

He <S%H7804>delivereth<s%> and <S%H5338>rescueth<s%>, and he <S%H5648>worketh<s%> <S%H852>signs<s%> and <S%H8540>wonders<s%> in <S%H8065>heaven<s%> and in <S%H772>earth<s%>, who hath <S%H7804>delivered<s%> <S%H1841>Daniel<s%> <S%H4481>from<s%> the <S%H3028>power<s%> of the <S%H744>lions<s%>. power: Cald. hand
So <S%H1836>this<s%> <S%H1841>Daniel<s%> <S%H6744>prospered<s%> in the <S%H4437>reign<s%> of <S%H1868>Darius<s%>, and in the <S%H4437>reign<s%> of <S%H3567>Cyrus<s%> the <S%H6543>Persian<s%>.
